entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sioux Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 02:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: ENE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:58 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023
